sentences.en: a tepid response from the audience
Always water plant thoroughly, using room temperature or tepid ( not icy ) water.
sentences.cn: 用室温水或微温水 ( 不是冰凉的 ) 给球兰浇水且一定要浇透.

sentences.en: Drinks some tepid the drink and the green tea.
sentences.cn: 多喝一些温热的饮料和绿茶.

sentences.en: He was a tepid sort of fish.
sentences.cn: 他是个不冷不热的家伙.

sentences.en: Her feet firmly planted on the tepid rough brick of the floor.
sentences.cn: 她一双脚稳固地立在微温而粗糙的砖地上.

sentences.en: However, the new second - rate products and manufacturers of products will be tepid.
sentences.cn: 但新的产品和 二流 厂商的产品将不温不火.

sentences.en: If the child can have a tub bath, sit him in tepid water up to midthigh.
sentences.cn: 如果小儿能用盆浴, 可让他坐在温水中使水泡至大腿的一半.

sentences.en: If your child's temperature rises, sponge her down gently with tepid water.
sentences.cn: 如果你孩子的体温上升，就用海绵蘸上温水轻轻地擦拭她的身体。

sentences.en: She bent her mouth to the tap and drank the tepid water.
sentences.cn: 她把嘴伸到水龙头底下去喝那微温的水。

sentences.en: The critics's reaction to the film was rather tepid.
sentences.cn: 评论家对那部影片的反映不太热烈.

sentences.en: The lost me always dream of this tepid sheen.
sentences.cn: 迷雾中的我,一直梦寐这亮晃晃的微温.

sentences.en: The play was greeted with tepid applause.
sentences.cn: 这台戏只得到了零落的掌声。

sentences.en: The tepid vodka bunced back up into her throat.
sentences.cn: 微温的伏特加涌了上来,一直顶到她的喉咙.

sentences.en: The water tricked out of the tap clear, though tasting stake and tepid.
sentences.cn: 从嘴子里流出来的水倒很清洁, 只不过味道不大新鲜,又有点热.

sentences.en: The water tricked out of the tap is clear, though tasting stake and tepid.
sentences.cn: 从水龙头里流出来的水倒很清洁, 只不过味道不大新鲜,又有点热.

trans.tran_cn: 微温的，不冷不热的，不热情的，半心半意的
trans.tran_en: a feeling, reaction etc that is tepid shows a lack of excitement or interest
